label: 菅原文時
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (899-981). Also known as Kan Sanbon 菅三品 (The Sugawara of the third rank"). Grandson of Michizane. "Erudite" of literature. Compositions in Honchō monzui (38). Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集 (43), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (8), and in Sakumon daitai (6). [道真、本朝文粋、漢詩、作文大体] "
